game.name: Bakumatsu Renka SHINSENGUMI
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: This is a romance game for women where you become the first female soldier in the Shinsengumi, fight alongside the other soldiers, and fall in love. Experience historical battles alongside the likes of Kondo, Hijikata, and Okita.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a romance game for women where you become the first female soldier in the Shinsengumi, fight alongside the other soldiers, and fall in love. Experience historical battles alongside the likes of Kondo, Hijikata, and Okita.
